projects.name: Twodo
projects.description: Twodo is minimal 2D engine built on WebGL. It creates abstractions for WebGL calls, while still allowing for low level control. Currently in the alpha stage of development.

projects.name: Three SVG
projects.description: Three SVG is a program that converts three-dimentional scenes to SVG. It is built with C++, and is my examination project for Swedish upper secondary school

projects.name: templtr
projects.description: templtr is an HTML templating framework that generates static sites. It supports dynamic data population, file embedding, markdown parsing, among other things.
